oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Please Don't Go - Eddy Arnold performance - 1969-01-29
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Please Don't Go, written by Alfredo Bracchi, Carl Sigman, and Giovanni D'Anzi, produced by Chet Atkins, arranged by Bill Walker, recorded on January 29, 1969 at RCA Victor Studio in Nashville, Tenn., and performed by Eddy Arnold (vocals), Jerry Reed (guitar), Pete Wade (guitar), Wayne Moss (guitar), Roy Huskey Jr. (bass), Kenneth Buttrey (drums), Farrell Morris (percussion), and Larry Butler (piano).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bracchi, Alfredo; Sigman, Carl; D’Anzi, Giovanni, 1906-1974; Atkins, Chet, 1924-2001; Walker, Bill; RCA Studio B; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Reed, Jerry; Wade, Pete; Moss, Wayne; Huskey, Junior (Roy Madison); Buttrey, Kenny; Morris, Farrell; Butler, Larry, 1942-2012
